snippet.title: Class of Heroes 2G - Launch Trailer | PS3
snippet.description:
Class of Heroes 2G is launching for the PlayStation 3 June 2, 2015. Students looking for adventure will want to crawl and explore the over 25 labryinths with over 100 quests to take on. Get additional details about your team and battles with the North American exclusive dual screen feature that allows you to pair your PS Vita or PSP to the PS3.   

http://monkeypawgames.com/portfolio-item/class-of-heroes-2g/
